description: This charred asparagus and mango salad recipe is made even tastier with a rich sesame dressing. Discover how easy it is to make.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Spring,Summer,Soy free,Wheat free,Mango,Asparagus,Spinach,Dairy free
name: Asparagus & Mango Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 mangoes, peeled, cut into thin wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a greased barbecue grill on high heat. Place asparagus and olive oil in a bowl. Toss to coat. Cook, turning occasionally, for 5 minutes or until charred. Set aside for 5 minutes to cool.
Place asparagus, mango, onion, capsicum, spinach and coriander In a large bowl. Toss to combine.
To make sesame dressing, place ingredients in a small bowl and whisk until sugar has dissolved.
Pour dressing over salad and toss to combine. Scatter over extra coriander leaves to serve.
